name: Identification of cash economy cases; retention of funds
text: [§231-85]  Identification of cash economy cases; retention of funds.  Notwithstanding any law to the contrary, each fiscal year, the special enforcement section may identify any taxpayer, assessment, investigation, or collection matter as a matter of the special enforcement section.  All revenues collected from special enforcement section matters shall be deposited into the tax administration special fund. [L 2009, c 134, pt of §2, §13(3); am L 2013, c 58, §1]
